post:
Hello everyone.
With the release of our new website and VPS plans, I would like to offer this exclusive sale to my LowEndTalk friends and community. Our company, based in Ontario Canada, has VPS nodes in Chicago, IL.

Find more information here: http://cubixcloud.com/vps.php

**VPS 512MB**
512MB dedicated RAM
30GB RAID-1 storage
500GB/month bandwidth on 1Gbps
OpenVZ/SolusVM
1 IPv4. (extra for $1.25/m)
Only [$6.49/month](http://clients.cubixcloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&promocode=let512 ) - recurring price! 
Use coupon code  let512
Payment is accepted via PayPal. 

We don't have many reviews yet but had a few LET users help us test servers back a few weeks ago. http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/2142/help-us-test-our-lowendbox-servers/p1

As always, please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Looking forward to working with you all :) 

Signup link: http://clients.cubixcloud.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=80&promocode=let512
